entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
